DataElement.preferredName: Patient Medical History Baseline Problem Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator to ask if pre-existing medical conditions are reported for an individual prior to enrollment in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to disease or medical problem present at initial evaluation for a clinical trial based on the medical record of previous health and occurrence of disease events in an individual.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: Baseline; an imaginary standard by which things are measured or compared.:Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: updated for ISO compliance for use on new protocol

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.description: Any other major medical illnesses that in the investigator's opinion will prevent administration or completion of protocol therapy

ReferenceDocuments.description: Other major medical illness which requires hospitalization or precludes study therapy at the time of registration

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any PAST or CURRENT major medical problems?
